hero_subtitle: Explore some of our Success Stories

cases.title: Tandartspraktijk Rembrandt | Website + Hosting
cases.description: Our student developers redesigned and optimized SEO for enhanced visibility among Amstelveen's dense market of dental services. The project, completed within a 30-day deadline, showcases our commitment to timely and effective delivery.
cases.technologies: Built with React, Vite, and SWC, and styled using SCSS and Tailwind CSS. We incorporated advanced SEO strategies to ensure superior search engine rankings.
cases.results: Achieved a perfect 100 SEO score on Googleâ€™s Lighthouse, underscoring our technical proficiency and ongoing commitment as we continue hosting and marketing the site.

cases.title: FRIDAY Mascara | Maintenance
cases.description: A dedicated Rijkware Student Developer manages technical operations for the site, working 16 hours a week to ensure smooth functionality and continual enhancements.
cases.responsibilities: The student is responsible for comprehensive technical upkeep and proactive improvements, maintaining high performance and user satisfaction.
cases.duration: Engagement began in February 2023 and continues to demonstrate our long-term support and reliability in partnerships.

cases.title: WatNu | iOS App
cases.description: Developed by a Rijkware Student Developer, the WatNu app revolutionizes event planning and task management. This intuitive app allows users to organize events, manage tasks, and share their agendas effortlessly with others.
cases.technologies: Developed in Swift and SwiftUI, with Firebase for real-time database storage.
cases.features: Features include creating and editing event plans, task management, and easy sharing of plans through QR codes, enhancing user interaction and collaboration.

cases.title: Green Office | Website
cases.description: Green Office is a platform promoting sustainability through team collaboration. Users can form teams, assign tasks for sustainability goals, and use live chat for communication.
cases.features: Features include customizable team logos, names, and mottos. This personalization enhances user experience and is displayed prominently on the team information page.
cases.management: Our platform supports dynamic team management and goal-setting, with live chat enhancing real-time communication and effective collaboration.

cases.title: Your Project | Website
cases.description: Reach out to us and discuss your vision. Together, we can create a plan and find the perfect Student Developers for the task.
